Group counselor employ community-based outpatient inpatient substance abuse treatment program randomly assign Toolkit treatment-as-usual condition . Data obtain audiotaped session identify group difference counselor adherence 12-step content skillfulness . Additional data collect counselor satisfaction , 12-step attitude belief , 12-step knowledge , well Toolkit acceptability , feasibility , short-term sustainability . Aim 3 determine whether exposure Toolkit curriculum result stable 12-step involvement decrease self-reported substance use among client .
